sentences.sentence: Without a friend, the world is a wildness.
sentences.translation: 没有朋友，这世界无异于荒野。

sentences.sentence: But you — it is your duty; in his case, it is wildness.
sentences.translation: 你，那是为了任务，而他呢，只是为了胡闹。

sentences.sentence: Now that all was well, I was glad to have spent those few hours of wildness with the elk.
sentences.translation: 既然一切都安然无恙，我也很高兴能和一头麋鹿在野外共同渡过了几个小时。
